item.description: ArgumentCapto<Person> peopleCaptor = ArgumentCaptor.forClass(Person.class); verify(mock, times(2)).doSomething(peopleCaptor.capture()); List<Person> capturedPeople = peopleCaptor.getAllValues(); assertEquals("John", capturedPeople.get(0).getName()); assertEquals("Jane", capturedPeople.get(1).getName());
